SELECT PAY_NO , C_CODE , CLASS_NO , CL_PAY_NO , CL_NAME , PAY_DATE , TR_NAME , CL_MAX , CL_DATE , PAYMENT.CL_TIME , C_NAME , C_ADDRESS , C_LA , C_LO FROM PAYMENT JOIN CL_ORDER USING(CL_PAY_NO) JOIN COFFEECLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN CAFE USING(C_CODE) WHERE PAY_NO = #{pay_no}

SELECT PAY_NO , PAY_ITEM , P.PURCHASE_NUMBER , S.SUBSCRIBE_CODE , PAY_DATE , NVL(PR_COUNT, 0) AS PR_COUNT , PAY_TOTAL , ADDR , DELIVERY , NVL(SUBS_MONTH, 0) AS SUBS_MONTH , NVL(SUBSCRIBE, 'N') AS SUB , SHIPPING_DATE , SHIPPING_STATUS FROM PR_PAY PR JOIN PAYMENT PAY USING(PAY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(BUYER_ID = ID) LEFT JOIN SUB S ON(PR.SUBSCRIBE_CODE = S.SUBSCRIBE_CODE) LEFT JOIN PR_PAY_WHICH P ON(PR.PURCHASE_NUMBER = P.PURCHASE_NUMBER) JOIN SH_STATUS USING(PAY_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PD1 ON(S.PR_CODE = PD1.PR_CODE) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PD2 ON(P.PR_CODE = PD2.PR_CODE) WHERE PAY_NO = #{pay_no}

SELECT PAY_NO , C_RES , CF_NO , C.C_CODE , PAY_DATE , PAY_TOTAL , C_RES_TYPE , C_RES_DATE , C_HERETIME , C_GOTIME , C_RES_PER , C_RES_ING , C_NAME , C_ADDRESS , C_LA , C_LO , BUYER_ID , CF_RES_HI , CF_RES_CAP , CF_RES_CUP , CF_AMOUNT , CF_CATEGORY , CF_NAME FROM PAYMENT PAY JOIN CARES CA ON(CAFE_RES = C_RES) JOIN CAFE C ON(CA.C_CODE = C.C_CODE) JOIN CORES USING(C_RES) JOIN COFFEE USING(CF_NO) WHERE PAY_NO = #{pay_no}
